item.title: Install nmap 6.40 on Ubuntu 12.04
item.description: This tutorial shows you how to install nmap 6.40 on Ubuntu 12.04. Ubuntu 12.04 has nmap 5.21 in the repositories. nmap 6 features a lot of improvements like full IPv6 support and better and faster scanning.
